column5: I had no idea it was Terry in the pic. I was looking for the tell tale baby finger lift and it was not there... hmmm. HH
Nicely done gents! I would have liked to have seen that video if you had "captured the moment" Brian.... I'm sure Terry had a few choice words while thinking he had lost the fish... .
I was going to give a narration of the event,but I,ll just add to that.    REEL REEL REEL REEL IT,S STILL ON  LMAO

Congrats Terry   I plan to make a hero drift from 500m upstream down to where Terry is fishing and beyond...Thank goodness for the massive line capacity on my Islander and the power of the 13' 3pc XST  Did I mention I only plan to retrieve halfway back through Terry's pool before starting my next drift
Mike, make sure to give your float a big SNAP right at the end of the drift, gotta keep any fish in the pool he's fishing on their toes!
Very nice, I'd like to try that one day...  Maureen
WAY TO GO BUDDY ON YOUR FIRST.
Way to go Terry. Spin or Pin? Looks like the far bank eh?
Oh oh another convert?  Nice fish Terry.
Too bad it was the only one for the day. Oh well.  YER DA MAN TODAY.
Nice work gents
Congrats!!, beautiful fish!
I love this shot Terry. Glad you kept the cover on.
Awesome    Congrats Terry on your first
Fantastic guys.  Glad you popped yer cherry Terry

thanks all I only had 1 and a half hours to fish cause I had to be in Bradford by 10 to pick ceramic tile for the bathrooms...now that's entertainment so I flipped a coin to see if I should get up at 4 to do 1.5 hours of fishing....I did, right sleepy head

I say a time to meet,as that way,IM NOT WAITING,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,          For a change                   :rofl2:  :rofl2:  I think this is the first time,you and Dave,got there before me,but I had to turn back and get his shot I picked up for him,,,,,,,,,,,,, So,it,s Daveys fault.LOL
but we were fishing each day before the time you said to meet  except today........

I do believe I was singing this song this morning,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  :rofl2:  <iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/Yh3ml8gzrd4?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>  Oh thats just so WRONG.   :w00t:  :w00t:  Atleast we have fun.
I'm never even gonna try to cast across the river in the dark again..but by the time I got the knot out it was light out...lol
Ya,it was a nice grease job.
ok I did do that...lol

Now that song is stuck in my head....lol...nice shootin bois....i gotta ask Terry....first hook up and landed??? or first landed....inquiring minds want to know...it isnt very often first hook ups result in success but more of a "lesson learned"  Grates!

well  well  I set the hook on a few..I think but first one I had on   but it was Bull luck that I got it in   it made a run right at me and I thought I lost him, the line went slack  I stopped reeling till the float started moving
Wish I had the video going,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,
no you don't....lol:whistling:

I'll make sure to grease Terry out if I ever see him fishing on the river  :)  Good job bud!  Nice fish as well, especially for your first one! (My first one was a skipper from the 'Geen, about 1/2lb, lol!)

Very true I lost my first few browns and my first 3 steelhead lol I had no idea of the epic battle I was in for!  My buddy was able to land his first chrome however it was a smaller one. You really have no idea what your in for until it take that first run and takes to the sky!  Nice work on your first steel head!
Really nice looking.Terry is kinda cute too Congrats Terry. Looks good on ya.
tHE DEADLY Pink work strikes again.....trout candy!!! . way to go....great fish. I've walked way to miles alreay this year to find zero Steelhead so far....rain rain rain
